channel.title: Paying $20 if somebody can help me
channel.description:
Basicly i have had troubles with my shops, i am using a palidino76 base 508 loading 525 the problem is when i try to buy something from one of the shops it just dc's me every time i try to buy an item
if somebody could help i am paying via paypal $20 as a gift
Thanks

item.title: Paying $20 if somebody can help me
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Against the rules.
Mods lock this please.
Either edit your title and post about the money part
or Lock.

Read full topic
item.source: Paying $20 if somebody can help me

item.title: Paying $20 if somebody can help me
item.dc:creator: @Ahyo Ahyo
item.description:
@Ahyo wrote:

dont make a promise you wont keep. And im not entirely sure, but i dont think its allowed to bribe people to help you do something with money. You shouldnt have any money involved.

Read full topic
item.source: Paying $20 if somebody can help me
